column1: #Text=Eska says : " Why did n't anyone tell us we have a secret prison we could have been throwing people in ? "
#Text=Desna says : " I 'd like to put my tailor in here .
#Text=She 's a powerful firebender named P'Li who can create explosions with her mind .
#Text=Ironically , I hired a guy with a similar ability to kill the Avatar myself once .
#Text=" Eska says : " Do n't feel bad .
#Text=I tried to kill Korra after she ruined my wedding .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Let 's just focus on keeping this woman in prison .
